726851f-a.title: Queens: Hillside Avenue - 215th Place
726851f-a.text:
Hillside Ave., south side, at its intersection with 118th Street. Its location in 1910 was south of Church Street, at Hillside Ave., showing the Richmond Hill station of the Montauk division
of the Long lIsland Railroad.
About 1910.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
